home.title: Draw Around
home.buyGame: If you enjoy Draw Around, once you're out of lockdown, consider trying Telestrations, the board game that this game is inspired from!

rules.0: Make sure you have a stable Internet connection and enough battery left on your device.
rules.1: You should be at least 4 people to play. One of you is named Game Master and creates the game. The Game Master sends the link to the game to the other players.
rules.2: Pick a word or sentence that the next person will have to sketch. The game starts when everybody has picked a word.
rules.3: Draw the word or sentence, or try to guess what the previous person drew.
rules.4: When everybody has drawn all of the words, we look at the drawing pads! Watch what the word or sentences your friends initially chose became thanks to their drawing skills.
rules.5: You can vote for your favorites drawings and see the podium of the bests drawings of your game
